attributes.action: Let the UK decide if Scotland remains part of it.
attributes.additional_details: Scottish Independance will have a massive effect on the entire UK, therefore the enotire UK should get a say on the matter.
attributes.background:
The Scottish nation have been for some time asking for yet another referendum on whether they should have their independance. 
We would like the UK goverment to hold a referendum on whether the rest of the United Kingdom want to keep Scotland as part of the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly whether you'd like Scotland only to become independent if a majority of the UK vote for it, and what would happen if the vote in Scotland was different to the rest of the UK.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
